apis.description: Gets the outcome results for users and outcomes in the specified context.

operations.notes: Gets the outcome results for users and outcomes in the specified context.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description:
If specified, only the users whose ids are given will be included in the
results. SIS ids can be used, prefixed by "sis_user_id:".
It is an error to specify an id for a user who is not a student in
the context.

parameters.name: outcome_ids
parameters.description:
If specified, only the outcomes whose ids are given will be included in the
results. it is an error to specify an id for an outcome which is not linked
to the context.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
[String, "alignments"|"outcomes"|"outcomes.alignments"|"outcome_groups"|"outcome_links"|"outcome_paths"|"users"]
Specify additional collections to be side loaded with the result.
"alignments" includes only the alignments referenced by the returned
results.
"outcomes.alignments" includes all alignments referenced by outcomes in the
context.

parameters.name: include_hidden
parameters.description:
If true, results that are hidden from the learning mastery gradebook and student rollup
scores will be included

apis.description:
Gets the outcome rollups for the users and outcomes in the specified
context.

operations.notes:
Gets the outcome rollups for the users and outcomes in the specified
context.

parameters.name: aggregate
parameters.description:
If specified, instead of returning one rollup for each user, all the user
rollups will be combined into one rollup for the course that will contain
the average (or median, see below) rollup score for each outcome.

parameters.name: aggregate_stat
parameters.description:
If aggregate rollups requested, then this value determines what
statistic is used for the aggregate. Defaults to "mean" if this value
is not specified.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description:
If specified, only the users whose ids are given will be included in the
results or used in an aggregate result. it is an error to specify an id
for a user who is not a student in the context

parameters.name: outcome_ids
parameters.description:
If specified, only the outcomes whose ids are given will be included in the
results. it is an error to specify an id for an outcome which is not linked
to the context.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
[String, "courses"|"outcomes"|"outcomes.alignments"|"outcome_groups"|"outcome_links"|"outcome_paths"|"users"]
Specify additional collections to be side loaded with the result.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description:
Specify additional values to exclude. "missing_user_rollups" excludes
rollups for users without results.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
If specified, sorts outcome result rollups. "student" sorting will sort
by a user's sortable name. "outcome" sorting will sort by the given outcome's
rollup score. The latter requires specifying the "sort_outcome_id" parameter.
By default, the sort order is ascending.

parameters.name: sort_outcome_id
parameters.description:
If outcome sorting requested, then this determines which outcome to use
for rollup score sorting.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description:
If sorting requested, then this allows changing the default sort order of
ascending to descending.

OutcomeResult.description: A student's result for an outcome

id.description: A unique identifier for this result

submitted_or_assessed_at.description: The datetime the resulting OutcomeResult was submitted at, or absent that, when it was assessed.

links.description: Unique identifiers of objects associated with this result

percent.description: score's percent of maximum points possible for outcome, scaled to reflect any custom mastery levels that differ from the learning outcome

outcome.description: The id of the related outcome

score.description: The rollup score for the outcome, based on the student alignment scores related to the outcome. This could be null if the student has no related scores.

count.description: The number of alignment scores included in this rollup.

course.description: If an aggregate result was requested, the course field will be present. Otherwise, the user and section field will be present (Optional) The id of the course that this rollup applies to

user.description: (Optional) The id of the user that this rollup applies to

section.description: (Optional) The id of the section the user is in

name.description: The name of the resource for this rollup. For example, the user name.

OutcomeAlignment.description: An asset aligned with this outcome

id.description: A unique identifier for this alignment

html_url.description: (Optional) A URL for details about this alignment

OutcomePath.description: The full path to an outcome

id.description: A unique identifier for this outcome

name.description: The title of the outcome or outcome group
